description: This file defines a React-like component using Qwik framework for a Tic Tac Toe game. It includes state management, user interaction handling, and rendering logic for the game UI.

methods.name: newGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Calculates the winner based on the current board state.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles user clicking on a cell; updates the game state accordingly.
